memberdef.name: KEEP_CAST_FRIENDLY
memberdef.initializer: template<typename T_C_Lhs, \ typename T_C_Rhs, \ typename T_C_Sbx, \ template<typename, typename> \ typename T_C_Wrap> \ friend inline tainted<T_C_Lhs, T_C_Sbx> sandbox_reinterpret_cast( \ const T_C_Wrap<T_C_Rhs, T_C_Sbx>& rhs) noexcept; \ \ template<typename T_C_Lhs, \ typename T_C_Rhs, \ typename T_C_Sbx, \ template<typename, typename> \ typename T_C_Wrap> \ friend inline tainted<T_C_Lhs, T_C_Sbx> sandbox_const_cast( \ const T_C_Wrap<T_C_Rhs, T_C_Sbx>& rhs) noexcept; \ \ template<typename T_C_Lhs, \ typename T_C_Rhs, \ typename T_C_Sbx, \ template<typename, typename> \ typename T_C_Wrap> \ friend inline tainted<T_C_Lhs, T_C_Sbx> sandbox_static_cast( \ const T_C_Wrap<T_C_Rhs, T_C_Sbx>& rhs) noexcept;
